Verses: 1 eppiraayeem Pesinapodhu Nadukkamundaayitru; Avan Isravelile Menmaipetraan; Avan Paagaal Vishayaththil Kutrancheydhu Madindhuponaan.

2 ippodhum Avargal Adhigamadhigamaaip Paavancheydhu, Thangal Velliyinaal Vaarppiththa Suroobangalaiyum, Thangal Buththikkerka Vikkiragangalaiyum Thangalukku Undupannugiraargal; Ivaigalellaam Thattaarudaiya Velai; Manusharil Paliyidugiravargal Kandrukkuttigalai Muththamidalaamendru Ivaigalaikkuriththu Sollugiraargal.

3 aagaiyaal Avargal Kaalaiyil Kaanum Megaththaippolavum, Vidiyarkaalaiyil Ozhindhupogira Paniyaippolavum, Perungaatru Kalaththilirundhu Parakkadikkira Padharaippolavum, Pugaikkoondil Erippogira Pugaiyaippolavum Iruppaargal.
4 naan Unnai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththuvandhadhumudhal Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraayirukkiren; Aagaiyaal Nee Ennaiyandri Vere Dhevanai Ariyavendaam; Ennaiyandri Ratchagar Oruvarum Illai.
5 naan Unnai Magaa Varatchiyaana Dhesamaagiya Vanaandharaththile Arindhukonden.
6 thangalukku Irundha Meychchalinaal Thirupthiyaanaargal; Thirupthiyaanapinbu Avargal Irudhayam Mettimaiyaayitru; Adhinaal Ennai Marandhaargal.
7 aagaiyaal Naan Avargalukku Singaththaippol Iruppen; Sivingiyaippol Vazhiyaruge Padhiviruppen.

8 kuttigalaip Parikoduththa Karadiyaippola Naan Avargalai Edhirththu, Avargal Eerarkulaiyaik Kizhiththu, Avargalai Ange Singam Patchikkiradhupola Patchiththuppoduven, Kaattumirugangal Avargalaip Peerippodum.
9 isravele, Nee Unakkuk Kedundaakkikkondaai; Aanaalum Ennidaththil Unakku Sagaayam Undu.
10 enakku Raajaavaiyum Adhipadhigalaiyum Erpaduththavendum Endraaye; Ippodhum Unnudaiya Ellaap Pattanangalilum Unnai Ratchikkum Raajaa Enge? Un Nyaayaadhipadhigal Enge?
11 naan Kobaththile Unakku Raajaavaik Koduththen; En Ukkiraththile Avanai Eduththukkonden.
12 eppiraayeemin Akkiramam Kattivaiththirukkiradhu; Avan Paavam Paththirappaduththappattirukkiradhu.
13 prasavasthreeyin Vedhanai Avanukku Varum; Avan Vivegamillaadha Pillai; Perukaalamattum Avan Nirkavillai.

14 avargalai Naan Paadhaalaththin Vallamaikku Neengalaakki Meetpen; Avargalai Maranaththukku Neengalaakki Viduvippen; Maraname, Un Vaadhaigal Enge? Paadhaalame, Un Sangaaram Enge? Manamaarudhal En Kangalukku Maraivaanadhaayirukkum.

15 ivan Sagodhararukkulle Janamperuththavanaayirundhaalum, Karththarudaiya Kaatraagiya Keezhkkaatru Vanaandharaththilirundhu Ezhumbivarum; Adhanaal Avanudaiya Ootrugal Vatrippogum; Avanudaiya Thuravu Suvarippogum; Adhu Ichchikkappadaththakka Sagala Padhaarththangalulla Uththama Padhaarththangalaiyum Vaarikkondupogum.

16 samaariyaa Than Dhevanukku Virodhamaagak Kalagampanninapadiyaal, Kutran Chumaththappattadhaayirukkum; Avargal Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal; Avargaludaiya Kuzhandhaigal Modhiyadikkappadum; Avargaludaiya Garppavadhigal Keerappattuppovaargal.
